lead_paragraph: SPRINGER--Myrna Katcher, died at the age of 82 on April 24, 2016. During her 82 years, Myrna touched many lives. To her husband Lenny of 60 years, she brought endless love and excitement. To her children Fred and Eileen, Jay and Lauren, Stacey and Charles, Matt and Susan she brought great love, compassion and encouragement to strive for the best and to always enjoy life. However, her grandchildren Paul, Greg, Ilana, Ryan, Madeline, Meryl, Madison and April were the joys of her life. She was enchanted by them and they by her. Myrna gave to her community and her friends throughout her life. We are all better for having known her style, grace and concern for others around her. Myrna never told us how to live a great life, she showed us. We will remember her fondly forever and ever. A funeral service is being held on April 26 at Congregation Ahavath Torah, 240 Broad Street, Englewood, New Jersey at 11:15. Myrna will be laid to rest at Beth David Cemetery in Elmont, New York immediately following the funeral. The family will be receiving guests to honor Myrna on Tuesday and Wednesday and Thursday at the home of Stacey and Charles Goldberg, 14 Clover Street, Tenafly, New Jersey. Anyone interested in remembering Myrna by donation should make that donation to charity of their choice. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SPRINGER, MYRNA KATCHER
